name: ListPaymentsReceived
description: Shows all payments received from customers with date, amount, and invoice reference.

name: RecordPaymentReceived
description: Records a payment received from a customer against one or more invoices.

name: PaymentsReceivedByCustomer
description: Shows payment history for a specific customer across all their invoices.

name: PaymentsReceivedByDateRange
description: Retrieves payments received within a specific date range for cash flow tracking.

name: TotalCollectionsByPeriod
description: Calculates total payments received for a given period for cash planning.

name: PaymentsByPaymentMode
description: Shows payments received grouped by payment method: cash, bank transfer, UPI, cheque, etc.
training_phrases: kaunse mode se zyada payment aaya

name: RefundToCustomer
description: Records a refund payment back to a customer for overpayment or returns.

name: UnappliedPayments
description: Shows payments received that haven't been matched to any invoice yet.

name: ListPaymentsMade
description: Shows all payments made to vendors/suppliers with date, amount, and bill reference.

name: MakeVendorPayment
description: Records a payment made to a vendor against one or more bills.

name: PaymentsMadeByVendor
description: Shows all payments made to a specific vendor over time.

name: PaymentsMadeByDateRange
description: Retrieves payments made to vendors within a specific date range.
training_phrases: show me this month's outgoing payments

name: TotalDisbursementsByPeriod
description: Calculates total payments made to vendors for a given period.
training_phrases: how much paid to vendors this month

name: ScheduledPayments
description: Shows bills due for payment in the upcoming period with due dates and amounts.
training_phrases: kya pay karna hai is hafte

name: RecordVendorAdvance
description: Records an advance payment made to a vendor before receiving goods or bill.

name: AdjustVendorAdvance
description: Adjusts a vendor advance against a received bill to close the advance liability.
training_phrases: advance ko bill se adjust karo

name: UnadjustedVendorAdvances
description: Shows vendor advances that haven't been adjusted against any bill yet.

name: ListBankAccounts
description: Shows all bank accounts configured in the system with their current balances.
training_phrases: which bank accounts do I have

name: BankAccountBalance
description: Shows the current balance of a specific bank account.

name: TotalCashPosition
description: Shows the total combined cash balance across all bank accounts and cash in hand.
training_phrases: how much money do I have

name: BankReconciliationStatus
description: Shows current bank reconciliation status for all accounts including unmatched items.
training_phrases: bank recon ka status kya hai

name: ReconcileBankAccount
description: Initiates or performs bank reconciliation for a specific account.

name: UnreconciledTransactions
description: Shows transactions not yet matched during bank reconciliation.

name: BankTransfer
description: Records a fund transfer between two bank accounts.

name: BankTransactionHistory
description: Shows recent transactions and statement entries in a bank account.
training_phrases: recent debits and credits in bank

name: ImportBankStatement
description: Imports or syncs bank statement data into the system for reconciliation.

name: CashFlowForecast
description: Projects future cash position based on receivables, payables, and scheduled transactions.
training_phrases: when will I run out of cash

name: UndepositedFunds
description: Shows payments received but not yet deposited to any bank account.

name: ListExpenses
description: Shows all recorded business expenses in the system.

name: CreateExpense
description: Records a new business expense with amount, category, and description.

name: ExpensesByCategory
description: Shows expenses grouped by category like travel, office supplies, utilities, rent, etc.
training_phrases: show me expenses grouped by type

name: ExpensesByPeriod
description: Retrieves expenses within a specific date range for period analysis.

name: TotalExpensesByPeriod
description: Calculates total expense amount for a given period.

name: ExpenseApprovalQueue
description: Shows expenses awaiting managerial approval in the queue.
training_phrases: kitne expenses approve hone baaki hain

name: RecurringExpenses
description: Shows regular recurring business expenses like rent, subscriptions, and retainers.

name: TopExpensesByAmount
description: Shows the highest value individual expenses for review.
training_phrases: where is most money going in expenses

name: ListAllCustomers
description: Retrieves the complete list of customers with key details.

name: CreateCustomer
description: Creates a new customer record with contact and billing details.

name: CustomerByName
description: Searches for a specific customer by name and shows their profile details.

name: CustomerOutstandingBalance
description: Shows outstanding receivable balance for a specific customer.

name: CustomerStatement
description: Generates a complete statement of account for a customer showing all transactions.

name: InactiveCustomers
description: Shows customers with no transactions in the last 90+ days.

name: ListAllVendors
description: Retrieves the complete list of vendors/suppliers with key details.

name: CreateVendor
description: Creates a new vendor/supplier record with contact and payment details.

name: VendorByName
description: Searches for a specific vendor by name and shows their profile details.

name: VendorOutstandingBalance
description: Shows outstanding payable balance to a specific vendor.

name: VendorStatement
description: Generates a complete statement of account for a vendor showing all transactions.

name: TopVendorsBySpend
description: Ranks vendors by total amount paid to them for spend analysis.

name: ProfitAndLossReport
description: Generates the Profit and Loss (Income Statement) report for a given period.

name: ProfitAndLossComparison
description: Compares P&L across periods â€” month over month, quarter over quarter, year over year.
training_phrases: compare this month vs last month P&L
is saal vs pichle saal P&L

name: BalanceSheetReport
description: Generates the Balance Sheet report showing assets, liabilities, and equity.
training_phrases: what are our total assets and liabilities

name: CashFlowStatement
description: Generates the Cash Flow Statement showing operating, investing, and financing activities.
training_phrases: cash flow statement for this year

name: TrialBalanceReport
description: Generates the Trial Balance report showing all account debit and credit balances.

name: GeneralLedgerReport
description: Shows the general ledger with all transactions for all or specific accounts.

name: AgedReceivablesReport
description: Generates aged receivables report showing customer dues by aging buckets (0-30, 31-60, 61-90, 90+).

name: BudgetVsActualReport
description: Compares actual financial performance against budgeted amounts.
training_phrases: how are we tracking against budget

name: DayBookReport
description: Shows all financial transactions recorded on a specific date.

name: ReceivablesVsPayablesSummary
description: Compares total receivables against total payables to show net position.
training_phrases: do we owe more or are we owed more
who owes us vs who we owe

name: MonthlyFinancialSnapshot
description: Provides a comprehensive monthly financial summary with all key metrics at a glance.

name: GSTR1Summary
description: Shows GSTR-1 summary for outward supplies filed or to be filed for a period.

name: GSTR1FilingStatus
description: Checks whether GSTR-1 has been filed for a specific period.
training_phrases: kya GSTR-1 file hua hai {{month}} ka
GSTR-1 filed or not for this month

name: GSTR3BSummary
description: Shows GSTR-3B summary with tax liability and ITC claims for a period.

name: GSTR2AReconciliation
description: Reconciles purchase data with GSTR-2A/2B from the GST portal to find mismatches.

name: GSTLiabilityThisMonth
description: Calculates total GST liability (output minus input) for the current month.
training_phrases: is mahine ka GST kitna hai
GST output vs input this month
kitna GST bharna hai is mahine

name: ITCAvailableBalance
description: Shows available Input Tax Credit (ITC) balance that can be claimed.
training_phrases: how much ITC do we have
kitna ITC available hai claim ke liye

name: ITCMismatchReport
description: Shows mismatches between claimed ITC and vendor filings in portal.
training_phrases: kitna ITC match nahi ho raha

name: HSNWiseSummary
description: Generates HSN-wise summary of transactions for GST filing.
training_phrases: item wise GST report by HSN

name: GSTReturnCalendar
description: Shows upcoming GST return filing deadlines and compliance calendar.
training_phrases: when is next GST filing due
next GST due date kya hai

name: EWayBillStatus
description: Checks status of e-way bills generated for goods movement.

name: EInvoiceStatus
description: Shows e-invoicing status and IRN generation details for compliance.

name: ReverseChargeTransactions
description: Lists transactions where reverse charge mechanism (RCM) applies for GST.

name: TDSDeductionSummary
description: Shows summary of TDS deducted on payments made during a period.

name: TDSPayablePending
description: Shows TDS deducted but not yet deposited with government â€” pending deposit.
training_phrases: TDS not yet paid to government

name: TDSReturnFilingStatus
description: Checks filing status of quarterly TDS returns (Form 24Q, 26Q, etc.).
training_phrases: kya TDS return file hua Q{{quarter}} ka

name: TCSCollectionSummary
description: Shows summary of TCS collected on sales during a period.

name: ListStockItems
description: Shows all stock/inventory items in the system with current quantities.

name: StockItemBalance
description: Shows current stock quantity and value for a specific item.

name: LowStockAlerts
description: Shows items that are below their reorder level needing immediate procurement.
training_phrases: kaunse items ka stock kam hai

name: StockValuationReport
description: Shows the total value of all inventory on hand using selected valuation method.
training_phrases: how much is our inventory worth
meri inventory ki value kitni hai

name: StockMovementReport
description: Shows inward and outward stock movements for items during a period.

name: DeadStockReport
description: Identifies stock items with no movement for 90+ days â€” non-moving inventory.

name: StockByWarehouse
description: Shows stock levels and distribution by warehouse or godown location.

name: StockAdjustmentEntry
description: Records a stock adjustment for damaged, lost, expired, or found inventory.

name: ListSalesOrders
description: Retrieves all sales orders in the system with status and amounts.

name: CreateSalesOrder
description: Creates a new sales order for a customer with items and quantities.

name: SalesOrderByNumber
description: Retrieves a specific sales order by its number for detailed viewing.

name: SalesOrderToInvoice
description: Converts a fulfilled sales order into a sales invoice for billing.

name: ListQuotations
description: Retrieves all quotations or estimates sent to prospective customers.

name: CreateQuotation
description: Creates a new quotation or estimate for a potential customer.

name: ConvertQuoteToOrder
description: Converts an accepted quotation into a sales order for fulfillment.

name: ListDeliveryChallans
description: Shows all delivery challans created for goods dispatch.

name: CreateDeliveryChallan
description: Creates a new delivery challan for dispatching goods to a customer.

name: ListPurchaseOrders
description: Retrieves all purchase orders in the system with status and amounts.

name: CreatePurchaseOrder
description: Creates a new purchase order for procuring goods from a vendor.

name: ConvertPOToBill
description: Converts a received purchase order into a vendor bill for payment processing.

name: ListCustomerCreditNotes
description: Shows all credit notes issued to customers for returns and adjustments.

name: CreateCustomerCreditNote
description: Creates a new credit note against a customer invoice for returns or adjustments.

name: ListVendorCreditNotes
description: Shows all credit notes received from vendors for purchase returns.

name: CreateVendorCreditNote
description: Records a credit note received from a vendor for returns or price adjustments.

name: ListJournalEntries
description: Shows all manual journal entries in the system.

name: CreateJournalEntry
description: Creates a new manual journal entry with debit and credit legs for adjustments.
